title: My pixel 2 xl has a black spot on the rear facing camera.
content: I have tried cleaning the lense, restarting it, and tried other apps like snap chat. I can try uploading screen shots but I am on vacation so it is difficult, it just spins and then fails. Email works better if there is an address to send to. Phone is about 2 weeks old and has the Google fabric case on it to ensure safety. Please help! I bought from the Google store directly.
